title: La Dieta del Dottor Mozzi
description:
Preserve your health through a diet that adapts in every way to your genetic heritage!

According to Dr. Mozzi there is a correlation between belonging to one's blood group and the foods we eat.

The blood group is given by a precise genetic imprint that distinguishes each individual from others, characterizes him and allows us to understand how our immune system is made and how it behaves.

It is possible to use the four blood groups 0, A, B, AB as a reliable guide to choose a diet suitable for each person, which can allow an improvement in one's physical condition and a reduction in the risk of falling ill. It can also help resolve any pathological states.

Based on the genetic characteristics of each individual, Dr. Mozzi has identified very specific dietary regimes that promote the consumption of certain foods to the detriment of others, based on their functionality, digestibility and the benefits they can bring to the body.

The blood group is given by a precise genetic imprint that distinguishes each individual from others, characterizes him and allows us to understand how our immune system is made and how it behaves.

Based on the genetic characteristics of each individual, Dr. Mozzi has identified very specific dietary regimes that promote the consumption of certain foods to the detriment of others, based on their functionality, digestibility and the benefits they can bring to the body.
summary: A guide to proper nutrition across the four blood groups.
